alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 2:41PM CDT until September 09 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CUSTER COUNTY... At 241 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Anselmo, or 24 miles northwest of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Anselmo, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, and Pleasant Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 249 and 265. Highway 92 between mile markers 257 and 270. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
